mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes for faster loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider reducing the number of high-resolution images and scripts to speed up loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta descriptions and use more targeted keywords for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve accessibility by adding text descriptions for images and ensuring color contrast meets accessibility standards.
tips: Ensure consistent navigation across different devices.
Implement lazy loading for better page speed performance.
